itineraries.title: Kerala 4 Days: Trivandrum → Varkala → Alleppey → Kochi
itineraries.summary: Beach, backwaters, and heritage with slow travel emphasis.

days.morning: Arrive in Trivandrum. Visit Padmanabhaswamy Temple (dress modestly).
days.afternoon: Head to Kovalam Lighthouse Beach for a calm lunch and sea time.
days.evening: Sunset at Hawa Beach; try local seafood and stroll the promenade.
tips: Dress modestly for temple visits (cover shoulders and knees)
Carry cash - many beach shacks don't accept cards
Best time for beach: Early morning or late evening to avoid crowds
Bargain at local shops - prices are negotiable
Try fresh coconut water from beach vendors

days.morning: Drive to Varkala (60 km). Coffee with cliff views at North Cliff.
days.afternoon: Relax at Varkala Beach; optional Ayurveda massage.
days.evening: Sunset on the cliff trail; dinner at a slow cafe.
tips: Cliff walk is best at sunrise or sunset
Be careful on cliff edges - they can be slippery
Ayurveda massages are cheaper here than in cities
Many cafes have cliff views - book ahead for sunset
Carry mosquito repellent for evenings

days.morning: Drive to Alleppey (110 km). Board a day houseboat or shikara.
days.afternoon: Cruise past paddy fields and coconut groves; village lunch.
days.evening: Golden hour on canals; dock and unwind.
tips: Book houseboats in advance, especially during peak season
Day houseboats are cheaper than overnight stays
Carry sunscreen and hat - sun is strong on water
Best time for backwaters: Early morning (6-9 AM) or evening (4-7 PM)
Bargain for houseboat prices - they're negotiable
Carry cash for village purchases

days.morning: Drive to Kochi (55 km). Explore Fort Kochi streets and Chinese fishing nets.
days.afternoon: Visit Mattancherry Palace and Jew Town; cafe breaks.
days.evening: Kathakali performance (optional) and dinner before departure.
tips: Fort Kochi is walkable - explore on foot
Chinese fishing nets are best seen at sunset
Kathakali shows usually start at 6 PM - book in advance
Jew Town shops close early (around 6 PM)
Parking is limited - consider walking or auto-rickshaw
Many heritage buildings have cafes - great for breaks

generalTips: Best time to visit: October to March (avoid monsoon June-September)
Carry light cotton clothes and a light jacket for evenings
Kerala is cash-heavy - keep sufficient cash
Book accommodations in advance during peak season
Try Ayurveda treatments - Kerala is famous for it
Respect temple customs - remove footwear, dress modestly
Bargain at local markets and shops
Carry mosquito repellent and sunscreen
Learn basic Malayalam phrases - locals appreciate it
Try local transport - buses and auto-rickshaws are affordable

days.afternoon: Walk through Old Manali. Lunch at cafe with mountain views.
days.evening: Stroll along Mall Road. Dinner and acclimatize.

days.afternoon: Ropeway ride for panoramic views. Lunch at dhaba.
days.evening: Return to Manali. Relax at hotel or cafe.

days.morning: Drive to Kasol (75 km) through Kullu Valley. Scenic stops.
days.afternoon: Check in. Explore Kasol market and riverside cafes.
days.evening: Walk along Parvati River. Dinner at Israeli cafe.

days.evening: Trek back or stay overnight in Tosh. Starry night.

days.evening: Departure from Dharamshala or overnight for next day flight.

days.morning: Leisurely morning in Coorg. Visit Dubare Elephant Camp (optional).
days.afternoon: Drive to Mysuru (120 km). Check in and rest.
days.evening: Visit Brindavan Gardens for musical fountain show.

days.morning: Visit Mysore Palace. Explore ornate halls and courtyards.
days.afternoon: Climb Chamundi Hills. Visit Chamundeshwari Temple. City views.
days.evening: Explore Devaraja Market. Buy Mysore silk and sandalwood.

days.morning: Drive to Hampi (340 km). Long journey with lunch break.
days.afternoon: Arrive Hampi. Visit Virupaksha Temple and Hampi Bazaar.
days.evening: Sunset from Hemakuta Hill with boulder landscape views.

days.morning: Visit Vittala Temple Complex. Famous stone chariot and musical pillars.
days.afternoon: Explore Royal Enclosure and Lotus Mahal. Lunch at local restaurant.
days.evening: Last views of Hampi ruins. Depart or stay overnight.

itineraries.title: Uttarakhand 5 Days: Rishikesh → Mussoorie → Nainital
itineraries.summary: Spiritual Ganges, hill station charm, and lake serenity.
itineraries.bestTime: March to June, September to November

days.morning: Arrive Rishikesh. Visit Laxman Jhula and Ram Jhula.
days.afternoon: Walk through ashram areas. Lunch at organic cafe.
days.evening: Attend Ganga Aarti at Triveni Ghat or Parmarth Niketan.

days.morning: White water rafting on Ganges (16 km stretch, 2-3 hours).
days.afternoon: Lunch and relax. Optional: Visit waterfall or yoga session.
days.evening: Leisurely walk along Ganges. Dinner at river cafe.

days.morning: Drive to Mussoorie (75 km). Check in and rest.
days.afternoon: Walk on Mall Road. Visit Gun Hill by ropeway.
days.evening: Sunset views. Explore local shops and cafes.

days.morning: Drive to Nainital (300 km). Long scenic journey.
days.afternoon: Arrive and check in. Boating on Naini Lake.
days.evening: Walk on Mall Road. Dinner at lakeside restaurant.

days.morning: Visit Naina Devi Temple. Take cable car to Snow View Point.
days.afternoon: Explore Eco Cave Gardens. Last lake views and lunch.
days.evening: Shopping for local handicrafts. Departure.

itineraries.title: Ladakh 7 Days: Leh → Nubra → Pangong → Tso Moriri
itineraries.summary: High altitude adventure with lakes, valleys, and monasteries.

days.morning: Arrive in Leh (3,500m). Complete rest at hotel.
days.afternoon: Light walk to Leh Market. Stay hydrated.
days.evening: Visit Shanti Stupa for sunset. Early dinner and rest.

days.morning: Visit Hemis Monastery (largest in Ladakh). Museum and murals.
days.afternoon: Explore Thiksey Monastery. Similar to Potala Palace.
days.evening: Visit Rancho School (3 Idiots fame) at Shey. Return to Leh.

days.day: Day 3 — Nubra Valley via Khardung La
days.morning: Early start. Cross Khardung La (5,359m). Photo stop at pass.
days.afternoon: Descend to Nubra Valley (120 km total). Visit Diskit Monastery.
days.evening: Camel ride at Hunder sand dunes. Stay in Nubra.

days.morning: Drive from Nubra to Pangong via Shyok route (150 km).
days.afternoon: Arrive at Pangong Lake (4,350m). Marvel at changing colors.
days.evening: Sunset at lakeside. Stay in camps near lake.

days.morning: Drive to Tso Moriri via Mahe Bridge (240 km). Spectacular route.
days.afternoon: Stop at Chumathang hot springs (optional). Continue journey.
days.evening: Arrive at Tso Moriri. Peaceful lakeside evening. Stay in Korzok.

days.day: Day 6 — Tso Moriri to Leh via Tso Kar
days.morning: Early morning at Tso Moriri. Bird watching (Brahminy ducks).
days.afternoon: Drive back to Leh via Tso Kar (220 km). Salt lake stop.
days.evening: Arrive Leh. Rest and last evening in Leh market.

days.morning: Visit Hall of Fame Museum. Learn about Ladakh's military history.
days.afternoon: Last minute shopping at Leh market. Tibetan artifacts, pashmina.
days.evening: Departure from Leh. Carry altitude memories.

itineraries.title: Tamil Nadu 6 Days: Chennai → Pondicherry → Madurai → Ooty
itineraries.summary: Temples, French colonial charm, and hill station retreat.

days.morning: Arrive Chennai. Visit Marina Beach and Kapaleeshwarar Temple.
days.afternoon: Drive to Mahabalipuram (60 km). Visit Shore Temple.
days.evening: Explore Five Rathas and Arjuna's Penance. Seafood dinner.

days.morning: Drive to Pondicherry (100 km). Explore French Quarter streets.
days.afternoon: Visit Auroville. Lunch at French cafe. Beach time at Promenade.
days.evening: Walk along Rock Beach. Dinner at rooftop restaurant.

days.morning: Leisurely breakfast in Pondy. Last French Quarter walk.
days.afternoon: Long drive to Madurai (310 km). Check in and rest.
days.evening: Visit Meenakshi Temple for evening aarti. Spectacular architecture.

days.morning: Full exploration of Meenakshi Temple complex. Intricate gopurams.
days.afternoon: Visit Thirumalai Nayak Palace. Local lunch with authentic Chettinad cuisine.
days.evening: Gandhi Memorial Museum. Explore local markets.

days.day: Day 5 — Ooty: Queen of Hill Stations
days.morning: Early drive to Ooty (280 km). Scenic ghat roads.
days.afternoon: Arrive Ooty. Visit Botanical Gardens. Tea at colonial-era cafes.
days.evening: Boat ride on Ooty Lake. Cool mountain evening.

days.morning: Toy train ride from Ooty to Coonoor (optional). Tea estate visit.
days.afternoon: Visit Doddabetta Peak for panoramic views. Shopping for tea and chocolates.
days.evening: Departure from Ooty or Coimbatore airport.

itineraries.title: Maharashtra 5 Days: Mumbai → Lonavala → Mahabaleshwar
itineraries.summary: City energy, Sahyadri hills, and scenic viewpoints.

days.morning: Visit Gateway of India and Taj Hotel. Boat to Elephanta Caves (optional).
days.afternoon: Explore Colaba Causeway. Lunch at Irani cafe. Marine Drive walk.
days.evening: Sunset at Marine Drive. Dinner at Leopold Cafe or local seafood.

days.morning: Visit Chhatrapati Shivaji Museum. Walk through Fort area.
days.afternoon: Drive to Lonavala (85 km). Stop at viewpoints. Check in.
days.evening: Visit Lonavala Lake. Try chikki (local sweet). Evening walk.

days.morning: Visit Bhushi Dam (seasonal waterfall). Tiger Point for valley views.
days.afternoon: Explore Karla and Bhaja Caves (ancient Buddhist rock-cut caves).
days.evening: Sunset at Lion's Point. Dinner at local restaurant.

days.morning: Drive to Mahabaleshwar (65 km). Visit Arthur's Seat viewpoint.
days.afternoon: Explore Venna Lake. Boating and horse riding. Strawberry shopping.
days.evening: Visit Mapro Garden. Strawberry cream and local products.

days.morning: Visit Elephant's Head Point and Lodwick Point. Panoramic valley views.
days.afternoon: Mahabaleshwar Temple visit. Last views and shopping.
days.evening: Drive back to Mumbai (265 km) or Pune (120 km) for departure.

itineraries.title: Gujarat 5 Days: Ahmedabad → Gir → Somnath → Dwarka
itineraries.summary: Heritage, wildlife, and spiritual coastal circuit.

days.morning: Arrive Ahmedabad. Heritage walk through old city pols (traditional houses).
days.afternoon: Visit Sabarmati Ashram (Gandhi's residence). Calico Museum.
days.evening: Dinner at local Gujarati thali restaurant. Kankaria Lake walk.

days.day: Day 2 — Gir National Park: Asiatic Lions
days.morning: Early drive to Gir (350 km). Long journey with lunch break.
days.afternoon: Arrive and check into resort near Gir. Rest and prepare for safari.
days.evening: Evening safari in Gir National Park. Spot Asiatic lions and other wildlife.

days.morning: Morning safari in Gir (optional). Breakfast and checkout.
days.afternoon: Drive to Somnath (60 km). Visit Somnath Temple - one of 12 Jyotirlingas.
days.evening: Attend evening aarti at Somnath Temple. Beach walk. Seafood dinner.

days.morning: Drive to Dwarka (230 km). Visit Dwarkadhish Temple.
days.afternoon: Explore Gomti Ghat. Boat to Bet Dwarka island (optional).
days.evening: Sunset at Dwarka beach. Evening temple rituals.

days.morning: Visit Rukmini Devi Temple and Nageshwar Temple.
days.afternoon: Last views of Arabian Sea. Shopping for local handicrafts.
days.evening: Return to Ahmedabad (440 km) or depart from Rajkot (220 km).

itineraries.title: West Bengal 5 Days: Kolkata → Darjeeling Tea Gardens
itineraries.summary: Colonial heritage meets Himalayan tea estates.

days.morning: Arrive Kolkata. Visit Victoria Memorial and Maidan.
days.afternoon: Explore Park Street. Lunch at iconic Indian Coffee House. Howrah Bridge.
days.evening: Walk through College Street. Dinner at Bengali restaurant.

days.morning: Early train (Darjeeling Mail) or flight to Bagdogra. Then drive.
days.afternoon: Scenic drive to Darjeeling (100 km from Bagdogra, 3-4 hours).
days.evening: Arrive Darjeeling. Check in. Walk on Mall Road. Mountain air.

days.morning: 4 AM start for Tiger Hill sunrise. Kanchenjunga views. Breakfast.
days.afternoon: Visit tea estate. Learn tea processing. Himalayan Mountaineering Institute.
days.evening: Explore Chowrasta. Tibetan market shopping. Momos dinner.

days.morning: Ride Darjeeling Himalayan Railway (toy train) to Ghoom and back.
days.afternoon: Drive to Kalimpong (50 km). Visit flower nurseries.
days.evening: Explore Kalimpong town. Durpin Monastery. Peaceful hill town vibes.

days.day: Day 5 — Return to Kolkata or Departure
days.morning: Morning views from Kalimpong. Visit local market.
days.afternoon: Drive to Bagdogra airport (80 km). Flight to Kolkata or onward.
days.evening: Departure with mountain memories.

itineraries.title: Meghalaya 4 Days: Shillong → Cherrapunji → Living Root Bridges
itineraries.summary: Wettest place on Earth, living bridges, and crystal waters.

days.morning: Drive from Guwahati to Shillong (100 km). Stop at Umiam Lake.
days.afternoon: Arrive Shillong. Visit Ward's Lake and Cathedral.
days.evening: Walk on Police Bazaar. Try Jadoh (local rice dish). Live music cafes.

days.morning: Drive to Cherrapunji (55 km). Visit Seven Sisters Falls and Nohkalikai Falls.
days.afternoon: Trek to Double Decker Living Root Bridge (3-4 hours round trip).
days.evening: Return and relax. Spectacular monsoon cloud views.

days.morning: Drive to Mawlynnong (90 km). Explore Asia's cleanest village.
days.afternoon: Visit Sky View platform. Walk to Living Root Bridge nearby.
days.evening: Continue to Dawki. Crystal clear Umngot River. Stay near Indo-Bangladesh border.

days.morning: Boat ride on Umngot River (looks like floating in air). Photography time.
days.afternoon: Drive back to Guwahati (180 km) for departure.
days.evening: Departure from Guwahati with memories of Meghalaya magic.

itineraries.title: Sikkim 5 Days: Gangtok → Nathula Pass → Lachung → Yumthang Valley
itineraries.summary: Himalayan monasteries, alpine valleys, and Indo-China border.
itineraries.bestTime: March to June, September to December

days.morning: Drive from NJP/Bagdogra to Gangtok (125 km, 4-5 hours). Scenic route.
days.afternoon: Arrive Gangtok. Check in. Walk on MG Marg (car-free street).
days.evening: Explore MG Marg cafes. Try momos and thukpa. Mountain views.

days.day: Day 2 — Gangtok: Tsomgo Lake & Nathula Pass
days.morning: Early start for Tsomgo Lake (40 km, 3,780m altitude). Sacred glacial lake.
days.afternoon: Continue to Nathula Pass (16 km more, 4,310m). Indo-China border. Permit required.
days.evening: Return to Gangtok. Rest after high altitude day.

days.morning: Drive to Lachung (118 km). Beautiful mountain roads.
days.afternoon: Stops at Tashi Viewpoint and Kabi Lungchok. Teesta River views.
days.evening: Arrive Lachung village. Traditional Sikkimese dinner. Prepare for next day.

days.day: Day 4 — Yumthang Valley: Valley of Flowers
days.morning: Early drive to Yumthang Valley (25 km, 3,564m). Valley of flowers.
days.afternoon: Optional extension to Zero Point (4,420m). Snow and alpine scenery.
days.evening: Return to Lachung. Relax at village. Hot springs at Yumthang (optional).

days.morning: Drive back to Gangtok (118 km). Leisure stops for photos.
days.afternoon: Last minute shopping at Lal Bazaar. Tibetan handicrafts, woolens.
days.evening: Departure from Gangtok or drive to NJP for onward journey.

itineraries.title: Andaman 5 Days: Port Blair → Havelock → Neil Island
itineraries.summary: Tropical paradise with pristine beaches, coral reefs, and history.

days.morning: Arrive Port Blair. Visit Cellular Jail (Kala Pani) - India's Alcatraz.
days.afternoon: Anthropological Museum. Learn about island tribes. Lunch.
days.evening: Light & Sound Show at Cellular Jail. Moving historical narration.

days.morning: Ferry to Havelock Island (2.5 hours). Check in to beach resort.
days.afternoon: Visit Radhanagar Beach (Beach No. 7) - Asia's best beach. Swim and relax.
days.evening: Sunset at Radhanagar. Seafood dinner at beach shack.

days.morning: Scuba diving or snorkeling at Elephant Beach. Colorful coral reefs.
days.afternoon: Relax at resort. Optional: Kayaking through mangroves.
days.evening: Visit Kalapathar Beach for black rocks and sunset. Quiet beach.

days.morning: Ferry to Neil Island (1 hour). Smaller and quieter than Havelock.
days.afternoon: Visit Bharatpur Beach and Laxmanpur Beach. Natural coral bridge.
days.evening: Sunset at Laxmanpur Beach (famous for sunset views). Stay overnight.

days.day: Day 5 — Return to Port Blair & Departure
days.morning: Morning at Neil Island. Last beach walk. Breakfast with sea view.
days.afternoon: Ferry back to Port Blair. Last minute shopping at Aberdeen Bazaar.
days.evening: Departure from Port Blair airport. Island memories.
